API documentation for PyMTÂ¶

  • PyMT: a multi touch UI toolkit for pyglet.
    • Obj: handle 3D mesh
    • Plugins: basic plugins management, used for desktop examples
    • Shader: abstraction of Shader compilation and usage
    • Logger: the PyMT logger
    • Pyglet: Soup on pyglet to provide multitouch interface.
    • Generic vector class to handle Vector operation.
    • Graphx: simplification of opengl pritimives
    • Geometric: module provide some class to handle 3D Mesh.
    • Gesture: Base for gesture recognition.
    • Matrix: matrix implementation, used for scatter
    • Loader: asynchronous loader, easily extensible.
    • NO DOCUMENTATION (module pymt.utils)
  • UI package: base for all ui things
    • Animation package: handle animation, and default alpha method
    • Window package: provide a window + a touch display
    • Factory: all widgets are registered through this factory
    • Wallpaper window: a window with background wallpaper
    • Colors: parse and handle CSS for PyMT
    • Simulator: generate touch event with mouse
  • Widgets: all the pymt widgets
    • Rectangle widget: draw a rectangle of his pos/size
    • Button package: implement different type of button (simple, toggle, image...)
    • NO DOCUMENTATION (module pymt.ui.widgets.mtanimatedmenu)
    • MTWidget: Base of every widget implementation.
    • Stencil container: A widget that clip drawing of children to his container
    • Button matrix: a lightweight and optimized grid of buttons
    • XML widget: parse xml and create his children
    • Video widget: provide a video container (avbin is needed.)
    • Kinetic : kinetic abstraction
    • Multislider: a multislider implementation based on MTSlider
    • Gesture widget: a widget with on_gesture event implementation
    • Modal window: a modal window implementation, that stop all interaction with widget on his back
    • Color picker: a simple color picker with 3 slider
    • Inner window: a lightweight window with fullscreen and resize ability
    • Slider package: provide multiple slider implementation (simple, xy, boundary...)
    • Vector slider: a radial slider that provide vector manipulation
    • Popup: a simple popup that use modal window
    • Tabs widget: widget that provide tabs (like tabbed notebook)
    • SVG widget: widget that display an svg image
    • Scatter package: provide lot of widgets based on scatter (base, svg, plane, image...)
    • NO DOCUMENTATION (module pymt.ui.widgets.vkeyboard)
    • Label: a simple text label
  • Form package provide label, button input, checkbox, slider...
    • Form: a form container
    • Abstract form widget: base for every form widget
    • Form button: button for Form
    • Form slider: a slider based on MTSlider + MTLabel
    • Form input: one-line text input
    • Form checkbox: a simple checkbox
    • Form label: A text-label with align support
  • NO DOCUMENTATION (package pymt.ui.widgets.layout)
    • NO DOCUMENTATION (module pymt.ui.widgets.layout.abstractlayout)
    • NO DOCUMENTATION (module pymt.ui.widgets.layout.gridlayout)
    • NO DOCUMENTATION (module pymt.ui.widgets.layout.boxlayout)
